abstract: Okay, so it’s not really the last word, but the legal case in the Supreme Court of New York against Bear Stearns‘ officers and directors, arising out of its transaction with JPMorgan Chase, was dismissed Thursday by Judge Herman Cahn.
lead_paragraph: Okay, so it’s not really the last word, but the legal case in the Supreme Court of New York against Bear Stearns‘ officers and directors, arising out of its transaction with JPMorgan Chase, was dismissed Thursday by Judge Herman Cahn.

headline.main: The Last Word on Bear Stearns
